Properties.ProtectedString:
local Tool = script.Parent local debris = game:GetService("Debris") local human = nil local passing = false
Tool.Handle.CanCollide = true
function onTouched(part)
if passing then local pos = Tool.Handle.Position Tool.Parent = game.Workspace Tool.Handle.Position = pos return end
local humanoid = part.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid ~= nil and humanoid ~= human then
-- steal the ball! Tool.Parent = humanoid.Parent wait(0.7)
end
end
function onEquipped()
human = Tool.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") Tool.Handle.boo:Stop()
Tool.GripPos = Vector3.new(1.5,-2,0.8)
end
function onUnequipped()
if Tool.Parent.Name == "Backpack" then Tool.Handle.boo:Play() end
end
function passBallTo(humanoid)
if humanoid ~= nil and humanoid ~= "changer" and game.Players:FindFirstChild(humanoid) ~= nil then passing = true
local currPlayer = Tool.Parent.Torso local lookAt = currPlayer.CFrame.lookVector.unit local outFrontBuffer = 5 local denom = math.abs(lookAt.x) + math.abs(lookAt.z)
local xPos = (lookAt.x/denom) * outFrontBuffer local zPos = (lookAt.Z/denom) * outFrontBuffer
local bodyPos = Instance.new("BodyPosition") bodyPos.position = game.Workspace:FindFirstChild(humanoid, false):FindFirstChild("Right Leg", false).Position bodyPos.P = 2000 bodyPos.maxForce = Vector3.new(bodyPos.P,bodyPos.P,bodyPos.P) debris:AddItem(bodyPos,5) wait(0.1) local pos = Tool.Handle.Position Tool.Parent = game.Workspace Tool.Handle.Position = Vector3.new(pos.x + xPos, pos.y, pos.z + zPos) bodyPos.Parent = Tool.Handle Tool.Handle.kick:Play() wait(0.1)
passing = false end
end
Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated) Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped) Tool.Handle.Touched:connect(onTouched) Tool.PersonToPassTo.Changed:connect(passBallTo)

local Tool = script.Parent local connection = nil local enabled = true local human = nil local shooting = false local kick = nil
local debris = game:GetService("Debris")
function onButton1Down(mouse)
if mouse.Target == nil or not enabled then return end
enabled = false
local humanoid = mouse.Target.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid")
-- pass the ball to someone if humanoid ~= nil and game.Players:FindFirstChild(humanoid.Parent.Name) ~= nil then Tool.PersonToPassTo.Value = "changer" wait() Tool.PersonToPassTo.Value = humanoid.Parent.Name
kick:Play() kick.Stopped:connect(function() kick:remove() end)
-- kick the ball else shooting = true
kick:Play() kick.Stopped:connect(function() kick:remove() end)
local targetPos = human.TargetPoint local v = (targetPos - Tool.Parent.Head.Position).unit
local currTorso = Tool.Parent.Torso local lookAt = currTorso.CFrame.lookVector.unit local outFrontBuffer = 5 local denom = math.abs(lookAt.x) + math.abs(lookAt.z)
local xPos = (lookAt.x/denom) * outFrontBuffer local zPos = (lookAt.Z/denom) * outFrontBuffer
wait() Tool.Parent = game.Workspace Tool.Handle.Position = Vector3.new(Tool.Handle.Position.x + xPos, Tool.Handle.Position.y, Tool.Handle.Position.z + zPos) Tool.Handle.Velocity = v * 100 Tool.Handle.kick:Play()
wait(0.1)
shooting = false end
enabled = true
end
function onEquippedLocal(mouse)
if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end
connection = mouse.Button1Down:connect(function() onButton1Down(mouse) end) mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png"
human = Tool.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") kick = human:LoadAnimation(Tool.soccerkick)
end
function onUnequippedLocal()
connection = nil
end
function onTouched(part)
if shooting then local pos = Tool.Handle.Position Tool.Parent = game.Workspace Tool.Handle.Position = pos return end end
Tool.Handle.Touched:connect(onTouched) Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)
